Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a pale-pink pottery wine-jar, comprising three smaller fragments now joined together, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text specifying the contents as wine.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389879) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389879)
